ygData.subject: Re: Charm (was: Karana Lambent Trading)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe you missed the start of the thread, which mentioned this is randomly broken. i.e. Sometimes it works properly, sometimes it doesn t, with no resist
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 18/99, CMai <CMai@...> wrote:
> From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
> <snip>
> Try it on yourself. Most of the time you will get the "you
> send forth music" message and icon, but will not be stunned.
> If you wait for the icon to disappear, you will get the "you
> are no longer stunned" message even though you were never
> stunned!
>
> It *is* broken.
> <snip>
>
> it is not broken! I used it in lguk 2 days ago. We were over swarm by 3
> mobs. So I used pixie strike on one of them and he was standing still for
> 10 second then started wacking again.

Maybe you missed the start of the thread, which mentioned this is
randomly broken. i.e. Sometimes it works properly, sometimes it doesn't,
with no resist message to indicate it failed. That is broken.
